title: Awesome!
comment: Free.  Doesn't require any permissions (aka not stealing your data).  Its open source. I was initially concerned with the last software update date. But it works flawless on my Galaxy Nexus with Android 4.2.2.  The poor reviews seem to be user error or crappy phones.  Also more options than I expected.  Very nice work!

comment: I love this app..

title: Perfectly adjustable thus a great app
comment: The Pedometer is a wonderful application. It can be fine-tuned/adjusted to suite the walking/running style and it can be operated with the screen on or off. The user has a lot of freedom and options to make it suite to his needs. Very accurate after adjusting it.

title: Excellent program but...
comment: Although un-installing, giving app five stars because the reason for the un-install is NOT the programmer's fault.  Some phone manufacturers allow the sensor to operate with the phone's screen off and some does not.  Mine, however, does not and am not willing use up the battery by keeping the screen on all the time, especally since I already have a pedometer stand alone unit.

title: I want to like it...

title: Good for a free app
comment: Gotta say it has worked pretty well in some testing with an out-dated MyTouch 3G, don't have the issue of not counting when the screen is off.  For others who are trying this out check in the settings and adjust if it is too sensitive or not sensitive enough, these seemed to work for me.  Also agreed with others in terms of having a logging option over the course of time would be nice.  Depends on accelerometer, so works best if held against your leg/waistline otherwise misses steps swinging in big pockets.
